# screener

Displays stock screener results according to chosen signal.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/screener signal
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| signal | Screener Signal | False | None |
